document_data.mainbody:
Blaedron was a person known to a War Wizard of Cormyr in the late 14 century DR.Blaedron almost certainly must have been a War Wizard or sanctum staffer.
One of the War Wizards protecting Vangerdahast in his sanctum near Mouth o Gargoyles after his retirement as Royal Mage called out to someone thinking they were Blaedron during Harnrim Staranghs raid into the sanctum. Harnrim took that moments hesitation to slay them.
